name: From Shadows
description: Action-platformer filled to the brim with blood, mayhem, and demons straight from hell! Play solo or with your friends in split-screen, upgrade your beast, and mow down hordes of enemies and their towering lieutenants.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual-Core - Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 / Athlon 64 X2 6000+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, DirectX速 9.0c Compatible - Intel HD 4400 / NVIDIA GeForce 9600GT / AMD Radeon HD 3850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX速 9.0c Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.1 GHz Dual-Core - Intel i3 2100 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB VRAM, DirectX速 9.0c Compatible - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 5850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX速 9.0c Compatible
